i broke my nose in 5th grade.
I took my black car to the desert and drove as fast as I could.
I am a Canadian who loves basketball, vintage clothing and my home.
I find that reading about the history of the world and its philosophy helps me put my own troubles into perspective.

i am the general manager of the local grocery store.

content.text: Hi there, how is your day going?
Hey, it's going well!  Just getting ready for my day at the grocery store.
Oh nice! I'm a big fan of grocery stores, I love to cook. What kind of food do you like to cook?
I like to cook healthy meals, so a lot of fruits and vegetables. I also like to make homemade pasta dishes.
That sounds delicious! I love pasta, especially spaghetti. I love to make my own sauce.
That's awesome! I'm not so great at making my own sauce, but I can cook pasta like a pro.
That's good! I've been trying to learn how to cook better, so I'm always looking for tips.
You can definitely learn a lot from watching cooking shows or reading cookbooks. I also like to find recipes online and try them out.
That's a good idea! I'll have to check out some recipes online. Do you have any favorite websites that you like to use?
I like using Pinterest for recipes. There are a lot of great recipes on there.
I've never used Pinterest, but I'll have to check it out. Thanks for the tip!
No problem! I hope you find some good recipes
